summary: It so happens that peaceful kindergarten teacher is incredibly similar to the terrible villain who stole the helmet of Alexander the Great. And villain's accomplices are unexpectedly similar to children - they also need love and care.
cast: Evgeniy Leonov|Georgiy Vitsin|Saveliy Kramarov|Radner Muratov|Erast Garin|Natalya Fateeva|Nikolay Olyalin|Anatoliy Papanov|Pavel Shpringfeld|Lyubov Sokolova|Oleg Vidov|Aleksey Vanin|Natalya Vorobyova|Zoya Vasilkova|Galina Mikeladze|Roman Filippov|Vladimir Protasenko|Vladimir Van-Zo-Li|Anatoli Yabbarov|Yekaterina Mazurova|Vyacheslav Gostinsky|Aleksandr Lebedev|L. Lyubomudrova|Aleksandr Lukyanov|Olga Seraya|Svetlana Starikova
title: Dzhentlmeny udachi
